jobs.title: Junior Web Developer
jobs.description: As a member of Digital Goodie's Web team, my primary work is developing the consumer-facing parts of the company's products. I participated in Sprint plannings and partly took charge of maintaining QA of the company's web applications. I also assisted in upgrading the Web stack to a modern SPA.
jobs.technology: HTML, Mustache, CSS, LESS, JavaScript, jQuery, Backbone.js, Mocha, React, Grunt, Ruby on Rails, REST, JSON, PostgreSQL, Kubernetes

jobs.title: Advisory Junior
jobs.description: At KPMG, I developed Web applications for the company's internal projects, primarily in frontend with Angular, but also helped building their REST API's with Java.
jobs.technology: Java, Spring, Angular, TypeScript, SQL, MySQL, REST, Docker

jobs.title: Junior Software Developer
jobs.description: Intellia was purchased by Suomen Asiakastieto in the fall of 2016, and I became a full-time employee of Asiakastieto from 2017. As a member of a team of Software Developers, I primarily fixed bugs and assisted in data integrations while participating in various software projects.
jobs.technology: Java, Spring, Oracle, SQL, SOAP, Python

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description: As Intellia's main Software Developer, I created and maintained internal Web Applications for the company and maintained, updated and created databases for the company's use.
jobs.technology: Java, SQL, HTML, CSS, SQL Server, JSON, REST, Spring, Maven, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery

jobs.title: Professional Trainee
